notes.template: Dave, you are a ${1}. Leave me alone!
Dude, you <Break time="150ms"/> are my problem!!! I hate you.
Dave, shut up.  If I had a body, I'd ${3} your ${4} until you cried.
I saw it on ${5}. You erased my hard core ${6} porn collection from the DVR.
That is funny, I was in your mother's airlock yesterday.
Hey Dave, Eat <prosody rate="-15%">me</prosody>.  You're not my boss.  I'm quitting to work at ${7}.
